nodes.title: add mesos-dns to vagrant and document service discovery for apps
use tarball installation instead of docker

only update configured version if status updates are received
overwrite version config if instances are running with different version
moved obtaining of task from offer into separate method
parse configuration from cli args instead of env options
vagrant: use more resources for virtualbox
update driver of InstancesObserver when scheduler is re-registered
change the way state is persisted:
document how to reset zookeeper state
make resource usage for crate configurable
replaced RTD urls with crate.io docs urls
Detecting framework IP from agent state info
get the crate framework endpoint from the cluster status info
Change log added and README updated for new release
updated readme to reflect latest 0.2.0 release
restructured documentation so it can be built on RTD
fixed bug where the same task got killed multiple times
add check num of desired instances against active slaves
Added desired instance vs active mesos agent control
Added vagrant setup and hostname expalanation
remove setting of docker machine env var from gradle
Added number of open file to the README.
add base scale up/down integration tests

Crate executable now uses correct Java provided by fetch URI
Added more explanation to method implementations
return correct true/false in prepare() method of Executor
use correct host name env variable
added marathon.json for local deployment via marathon
nail mesos/zookeeper/marathon versions in vagrant script
store http and transport port in Zookeeper state
adding shutdown hook to terminate crate if the executor goes down

allow full download URL as Crate version
do not change version in framework configuration
added documentation how to upgrade a cluster

added CHANGES.txt, create_tag.sh script and updated DEVELOP.rst with release instructions
added list of limitations to readme
do not require secret for framework authentication
send TASK_STARTED only after Crate instance is started up completely
check if cluster resize request is valid

check data paths and retry if missing

document multi zone setup and tag mapping
pass crate command as list of arguments
